casebody.data:
PACIFIC INTERNATIONAL TOOL & SHEAR, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. CERTAINTEED CORPORATION, Defendant-Appellee. No. 04-1121. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. DECIDED: July 13, 2004. On Appeal from the United States District Court for the Western District of Washington, 02-CV-839. Dennis J. Mondolino, Principal Attorney, Edward M. Reisner, Brian W. Nolan, Pamela C. White, of Counsel, Morgan, Lewis, New York, NY, for Defendant-Appellee. Edward W. Bulchis, Principal Attorney, Mark S. Carlson, of Counsel, Dorsey & Whitney, Seattle, WA, for Plaintiff-Appellant.

Before MICHEL, LOURIE and RADER, Circuit Judges.

*394Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir'. R. 36.
